Package com.lightbend.akka.sample

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardActor
    CardActor defines card actors.
    CardActor.recordToList
    Message: Record cards to the list in transactionlist actor right after initializing the card.
    CardActor.Transaction
    Message: Sending transaction information to the terminal
    CardBalanceListElement
    Balance list used to check last situation of each card.
    Constants
    All constants used in simulator stored in this class.
    Kind
    Instead of using numbers for each type, card and terminal kinds defined.
    TerminalActor
    Terminal actor gets cards request and directs it with its own information to the transactionlist actor.
    TerminalActor.receivedAmount
    Card request receiver.
    TerminalActor.recordToList
    Message: Record terminals to the list in transactionlist actor right after initializing the terminal.
    TerminalListElement
    Terminal list used only for data record.
    TimeConverter
    Simulation time is accelerated by multiplying current time with "timeaccelerator" constant.
    TransactionList
    TransactionList actor works as accountant.
    TransactionList.receivedCardInitialization
    Last state of cards are kept in this list.
    TransactionList.receivedTerminalInitialization
    Terminals stored in the list right after their initialization.
    TransactionList.receivedTransaction
    Transactions received by terminals are kept in the list.
    TransactionListElement
    Transaction list used to keep record of each card payment request.
    TransactionSimulator
    Main file for simulation.
    Writer
    Write is responsible for writing output file in csv format.
    Writer.transactionAddLine
    Add new transaction info as a line into the csv file
    Writer.transactionFileCreate
    Create transaction log file .csv
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Kind.cardKind  
    Kind.terminalKind
